One movie that you might enjoy is "Be Kind Rewind." This movie follows two bumbling store clerks who accidentally erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

The main characters are Danny Glover and McCoy Tyner, both well-known actors in Hollywood. The movie also features Sigourney Weaver as one of the characters. Overall, "Be Kind Rewind" is an enjoyable and entertaining movie that is definitely worth watching.
